author: dims
msg: This is Part II of the effort to eliminate dependency on javax.servlet.http.*;
1. With this you should be able to use tomcat 4.0 latest from cvs (or nightly build)
2. Am unable to test request.xsl, response.xsl, util.xsl and session.xsl thoroughly.
3. Can everyone test their XSP's to make sure that nothing is broken??
Yes, Part III will actually be org.apache.cocoon.environment.Request
and org.apache.cocoon.environment.Response interfaces for use by all the
